mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.supplier_code AS "supplierCode", a.supplier_name AS "supplierName", a.duty_paragraph AS "dutyParagraph", a.bank AS "bank", a.bank_account AS "bankAccount", a.tel AS "tel", a.address AS "address", a.type AS "type", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_supplier( id, supplier_code, supplier_name, duty_paragraph, bank, bank_account, tel, address, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{supplierCode}, #{supplierName}, #{dutyParagraph}, #{bank}, #{bankAccount}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_supplier SET supplier_code = #{supplierCode}, supplier_name = #{supplierName}, duty_paragraph = #{dutyParagraph}, bank = #{bank}, bank_account = #{bankAccount}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
